Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by West Texas in 1977...
Injured on 6/29/1978 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/11/1979, off David Trinkle (CC)...
Traded from West Texas to Wisconsin on 7/21/1979 (Going to WT: RF E. Gatson, SS G. Valls. Going to WIS: P M. Cortes, CF A. Render)...
Injured on 5/4/1980 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/30/1980, off Andres Echeverria (MAN)...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 7/22/1984 (Going to PIT: CF A. Render, P R. Najera. Going to WIS: P L. Harrison)...
